bug.text: A change to make Unix servers more robust in heavy use accidentally meant that Windows servers could reject valid connections.
The cached data inside Anys was not reset, meaning that reusing an NVList did not work.
Recoverable errors from accept() were not handled.

bug.summary: Broken stubs for typedef to sequence of forward-declared structs
Intermittent errors using GIOP 1.0 with bidirectional settings
bug.text: When bidirectional GIOP is selected, a thread is started to read incoming messages. That thread would be upset if it received a message from GIOP 1.0 or 1.1. The thread should not be started unless the connection is used for GIOP 1.2.
